scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists of certiorari memos written by Reed's law clerks regarding petitions submitted to the Court. The organization of these memos indicates cases for which the Court has original jurisdiction (versus appellate), cases that received oral argument (argued cases), and miscellaneous applications for relief (misc. docket).
Arranged chronologically by court term and then numerically by docket number.
